definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: He pointed a thick finger at a purple button near the speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 他用粗粗的手指點着里程計旁邊一個紫色按鈕。

sentences.english: A localization framework combining odometer and PTZ vision based on real-time position credibility was designed.
sentences.chinese: 並基於該模型建立里程計和PTZ視覺定位的框架。

sentences.english: In this paper, the OD error equations are proposed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細推導了里程計的速度誤差方程。

sentences.english: Odometry Used for speed measurement and distance measurement.
sentences.chinese: 里程計用於測速和測距。
